record.title: MEASURES PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--S. 1348 AND H.R. 2080

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I understand there are two bills at the desk due for a second reading.

record.chair: Without objection, the clerk will report the bills en bloc for the second time.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I object to any further proceedings on these matters.
